title: Labour Force Survey [NI Monthly]
publisher: Northern Ireland Statistics and Research Agency
description: The Labour Force Survey (LFS) is a quarterly sample survey carried out by interviewing people about their personal circumstances and work.
datasetNotes: On landing page scroll down to heading "Tables" and click link "Latest tables from the Labour Force Survey - Monthly". On new page scroll down to the dataset link under heading "Documents".
sizingNotes: Several tabs with largish tables and multiple dimensions. Some footnotes but table structures straightforward.
